storyInfo: Mountain finds he's lost a copper button, but fortunately, he has his new friend Xiaohei by his side.

attributes.content: Master? It's so dark here... Why can't I see anything...?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm right here.
attributes.name: Wuxian

attributes.content: Then what are we here for? Are you going to teach me a new move?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Xiaohei, to perceive the nature spirit, you mustn't rely on your five senses alone.
attributes.name: Wuxian

attributes.content: I've temporarily sealed your vision to improve your sensitivity to the presence of metal around you.
attributes.name: Wuxian

attributes.content: Ugh, I can't see anything. This is hard...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I have a metal ball stored in my pocket. How much you can perceive?
attributes.name: Wuxian

attributes.content: Mmgh... it's really fuzzy, but I think so!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Good. I'll carry it as I walk around you. You must determine my position by sensing it. Relax. I won't move too far from you.
attributes.name: Wuxian

attributes.content: What if I can't do it, master?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: No need to fret, we'll take it slow. Now, come and catch me.
attributes.name: Wuxian

attributes.content: ...Okay, um... on the left, I think?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: There's nothing here. It feels like you're behind me.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Master?! No, not there.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (I need to calm down, mmgh... there!)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Darn, I messed up again.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Where are you, Master?! This is too hard. I don't think I can do it.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Master, say something...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Master, where are you...?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Master?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mroaaaw—!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Yawns) What's wrong, Xiaohei? Were you having a bad dream?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Meow.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Rubs Xiaohei's head) I'm right here, it's okay.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mew!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Go back to sleep.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Licks Xiaobai's hand) Mreww.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'm here... it's okay... *snore*...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Did she fall asleep?)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Tiptoes off the bed)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (I can't get any sleep now. Might as well take a walk outside.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I keep dreaming about Master the last few days.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I don't even know when we'll be able to go back. It's been so long, he has to be looking for me.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I wonder if Ah Gen and Xiaobai miss Mom, Dad, and Grandpa too?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mm. We've gotta find a way back as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And I guess I should go back and sleep... Uh, where am I, though?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Am I... lost?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *huff*... *pant*... I'm beat.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And wasn't I just here?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: This ship's way too big. I'm never gonna find my way back.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And there's no one to ask for directions this late either.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Are people fighting?! Shoot, what if a bad guy got in?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I've gotta give 'em a proper greeting, then.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I think the sounds were coming from this room.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Huh? Isn't this where the operators usually train? Is that... Mr. Fu?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: No, he doesn't wear clothes like that.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: It's not sunup yet, I've still got time for four more sets of shadowboxing.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Hup, hup. Jab-jab, cross.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Rragh!!! Again!
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Wow, look at those fists... He beat a sandbag out of shape with just a few punches.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I dunno who's stronger, me or him.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Twitches ears) Hrm...
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (Stops punching) Who's there?!
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: A Feline kid?! Are you a patient here?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: No, I'm an operator, like you.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: They made you an operator that young? I find that hard to believe... What exactly can you do?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Don't underestimate me, I'm real strong. If you don't believe me, we can have a showdown.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Let's not. I'm not confident I can stop my fists before you get hurt.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: No need to hold back, gimme all you've got!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I... No. What sort of self-respecting adult bullies a child?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (Assumes stance) How will you know if you don't try?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (He has a measured posture, with very stable footing. There does seem to be something to him... Fine, can't hurt to help him train.)
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Well then, my young friend, stay sharp.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Take this!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Huff—
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: You're as quick as lightning, for someone your age. I'm confident in my jabs, but I don't see myself landing any clean hits on you.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (Wipes off sweat)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Your fists are incredible. I could barely dodge by a hair.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hahahah. It seems I've only scratched the surface of what this ship's operators can really do. That reminds me, my friend—what are you doing here at this hour?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I couldn't get to sleep, so I went out for a walk, and... got lost. Now I don't know the way back to the dorm.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You must be new here then. I can sympathize—this place sprawls, and they don't make things simple. Learning to navigate it can be a challenge.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: But aren't children your age usually getting sleepy around now?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I... I've got some stuff on my mind.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Do children today really have so much weighing on them, so young?)
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Never mind, let's call it here. Let me show you the way back.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I've lost a button from my jacket.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: A button? You could just go and sew a new one on.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: They don't make this sort anymore. It won't be easy to come by.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Try a different one, then?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Unfortunately, they're special to me. I've always treasured them, since my father had a particular love for them on his own coats... It'd be a shame to lose it.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: For now, let me walk you back. I'll retrace my steps tomorrow and see if I can find it.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Is it really important to you?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Yes. I think of my father whenever I see them.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Then... are they made of metal?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: They are.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I'll help you look! I've got the ability to sense metal. A metal button like those ones, right? I can pinpoint it if it's not too far.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: So you wield such Originium Arts too... But no, go back and get some rest. If I can't find it tomorrow, I'll come straight to you. How's that?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: It's fine, I'm all pumped up right now. I wouldn't be able to sleep anyway.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Then by all means, my friend. But before I forget, my name is Anthony Simon, and it's a pleasure to meet you. You can also use my codename 'Mountain,' if you so prefer. What's your name?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I'm Xiaohei!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Would you like me to carry you?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: N—No, it's fine, I'm not a kid!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hahahah, I understand. Stick close to me, then. Let's try not lose our way again.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I came here to do some reading this morning, and may well have lost the button somewhere by the bookshelves. Can you sense anything?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Umm... I think there's something really small and round.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Raises hand up and forms a fist)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: It's not a button though, it's a coin. Do you want it?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I see, a game token... Can you sense any similar metals?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: ...There's nothing else. Sorry.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That's fine, no doubt it lies elsewhere. Come to think of it though, have you had the chance to try the games here? Logistics has acquired quite a few game disks and tapes.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I don't really play that stuff. Do you?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Er, I can't say I do, these days. If I'm here, it's most likely only to borrow some books.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: ...I don't really read books either. I only know a few of the shapes in them.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Would you like to, then?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I would! But...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: As I recall, there also have picture books here, meant for schooling children... Right, there they are. Here.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: So this one has all pictures? Thank you...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: All it takes is to be an earnest reader. Be it words or pictures, you'll find yourself reaping the rewards.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Okay, let's be on our way. Hold onto that book. I think we'll visit Miss Lena's garden next—I assisted her with moving some goods around noontime.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: ...Are they gone? I literally play here at night so I *don't* see other people. Who'd have thought someone'd come anyway?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: I mean, they are gone by now, right? Like, *gone* gone?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Alright, continue from save, I guess. Let's see... what do I equip? Bow's good for clearing trash in this stage, but melee's better for the boss fight. Choices, choices...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Puts down controller)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Orrr... maybe I should've tried to say hello when they came in.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: How very lucky of us. We came just in time to find the queens of the night in bloom.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: These flowers are so pretty! They smell so gentle, too. It's nice.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Draws a deep breath)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mmm... okay, we'll have to keep looking for your button, it's not here. Maybe the next place.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: There's no need to rush, Xiaohei. You enjoy it here, don't you? We can look around a while longer.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Can we?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Miss Lena takes excellent care of this garden, and most of the flowers here are for her own perfumes. If you ever have trouble sleeping again, have her mix some soothing fragrances for your room.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Miss... Lena? Then who's that man over there?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Shoots a glance at Xiaohei)
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: Miss Lena bade an operator to help pick the flowers, I presume... After all, queens of the night don't bloom at any other time.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Oh, I get it, no wonder he's got such a long sword. I bet it cuts stuff real neatly.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *sniff* *sniff*
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (This queen of the night thing smells really good. I wonder if you can eat it. It couldn't hurt to try a little, right?)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Moves to bite) Ahh—
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Weird little brat. You like how it smells, so you immediately go to give it a bite?
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: What's so weird about it? Can't you eat these?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Pardon us, sir. Children often think in peculiar ways. We mean no offense.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Suit yourselves. Just don't bother me.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: It's not like we'd get in the way of your work from all the way over here.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Wrong. I'm not working.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I'm awaiting the unparalleled beauty revealed by the spectacle of life at the moment it verges on disappearance. It passes in the blink of an eye, so I must devote all my focus to it.
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I... didn't get any of that.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'd imagine he means the queen of the night only blooms for a few hours. Admire it while you can, for it will wilt before you know it.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: It only blooms for that long? I'm not eating it, then. Just watching is enough.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Shaking head) Tch. Children...
attributes.name: Flamebringer

attributes.content: I bet... that man's got amazing sword skills, right?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hahahah, you want to spar with him too? Don't do it here, at least. Miss Lena wouldn't be happy to see people getting into fights in her garden.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Okay! Then let's go to the next place and find your button!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That garden was so pretty though, I wanna bring Xiaobai and Ah Gen there next time. Um, Xiaobai and Ah Gen are my friends.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Well, nothing is stopping you. Miss Lena's garden is open to all operators. Feel free to visit it at any time.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Hello, Mountain, this is awfully early. I almost thought you were Ethan. And who's your friend here?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I'm Xiaohei. I'm helping Mountain look for his button.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I may have lost it here, you see. You wouldn't happen to have to seen it, would you Matterhorn?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: If I find any lost items when I'm cleaning, I put them in that box over there. You're welcome to take a look.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Alright then. Thank you.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: You're welcome.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Um... I tried sensing just a moment ago. There's no metal in there at all.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Really? How troublesome—this was the last place I visited yesterday. After that, I spent the whole time in the training room until you arrived.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: How about we start again from the beginning? I'm sure we'll find it.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'll spare you the hassle and see you back to the dorms. It's late. Children won't grow tall without enough sleep.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Then what about the button? Are you gonna give up?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mm. Perhaps someone else picked it up. Tomorrow, I'll post a lost item notice and see where that gets me.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I'm sorry I wasn't any help...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: But you wanted to, and that's more than enough for me. Thank you.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: What's the matter? You couldn't find it?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Indeed. The boy's more upset about it than I am, and I'm the one who lost it.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Here, Xiaohei, have some candy from my homeland. Don't let it get to you.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Thank you, Matterhorn...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Pats Xiaohei's head) Come on then, let's be off.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Would you like to learn how to read? I don't have much in the way of upcoming missions, so I can certainly find the time to teach you.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Sure...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Have you tried the candy he gave you? How does it taste?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Not yet...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You don't have to feel so bad, Xiaohei. It's just a tiny little button. It's alright.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: But you said it was really important...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Meow, we meet again, you giant boulder. And you've brought a darling Feline along to boot?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Haze. What are you doing out this late?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Shh. Someone had a thirst for a stroll tonight, so I had to come out with.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But there's nobody with you...?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: It's my hat. A moment of peace is ever so elusive with this thing around. Don't you agitate it, meow.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (This lady... speaks weird.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Stay, stay, I'm just giving these two operators a meow-do-you-do. I'll be right on my way. You settle down now.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Yes, I know, it was our titan here who bumped into me on the way to the training room this afternoon. But he apologized, you know. No need to be so mewdy.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Whisper) Who's she talking to?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Whisper) Her hat.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Dear me. Boulder, little Feline, I need to be on my way. Even more deranged things will spill out of me if I stay any longer.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Suddenly furrows brows)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Wait, what's that... That's it, she has it on her!)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Miss, could you hold on for just for a moment?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: What is it, little Feline? Are you looking to prize yet more nonsense out of your friendly witch?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Can I, um, ask what's in your pocket?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Just some loose odds and ends.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Reaches out, and then suddenly forms a fist)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Oh! Is this some Originium Arts? Why are the things in my pocket flying out at you?!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Opens hand) Mountain, is this your button?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hrm. Yes. Haze, why would you have my button on you?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Oh, meow... I've been caught.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I have far more valuable items on me. Why insist on stealing a single button?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (Sticks out tongue) It had far too pretty a design for its own good—my heart leapt on seeing it, and it seemed not to cost so dearly. I would've given it back to you after I had my bit of fun with it.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: It may not be valuable, but it's really important to Mountain! He was so worried when he lost it!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You have to understand, my father used to love this kind of button. Add the fact that they don't sell them anymore, and you can see why it's so significant to me.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: My apologies. I didn't know it was so precious to you... I had no intent to hurt you, boulder that you are.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: If you ever need any assistance in future, come seek me, why don't you? Let me make up for this mishap.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: No need for that. Now that we've found it, all's well that ends well.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (Hugs Xiaohei) Thank you, little Feline.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Mmngh?! What's your deal?!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: If it weren't for mew, I would've broken my very own set of rules, and neither my hat nor I would be delighted about that.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Struggling) I get it. Now let me go.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Releases Xiaohei)
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Hah, hah, hah! So long then, little Feline. With your cuteness, we'd be remiss not to see each other plenty more in future. Meow revoir.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: She's such a weirdo. I caught her stealing stuff, and she thanked me for it.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'd have to assume she's drawn lines she doesn't want to cross, as a thief.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Aren't you mad at her?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I'm more grateful to you than mad at her, Xiaohei. I'd never have found it so easily without your help.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: No problem. You're my friend.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: And I'm honored to be so.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (Yawn—)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Will you be alright for tomorrow, after staying up this late?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: It's okay, there's nothing important happening.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Then could you tell me why you're having trouble sleeping?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I—I miss my Master.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Xiaohei, the reason I use the same buttons my father did is because doing what he used to lets me feel closer to him.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Though he's no longer here, that feeling remains unchanged.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Perhaps you'd like to try something like that too. Do something your Master would do. It might make you feel better.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Something Master would do...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mountain! Xiaohei! Excuse me, make way, please! Emergency!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: That's the Medical Department right up ahead. I assume something happened to a patient and they need emergency treatment.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Do they always work this late?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: There's no day or night in Medical. So long as they're needed, they have to stay on call.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I can see the lights in there... It's as bright as daytime.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: It seems you're aching for a look. Would you like to visit?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Yeah, I know one of the sick people in there, but I don't know how she's been doing lately. I wanna see her.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Then no time like the present.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Rate of originium crystal expansion is accelerated in patient's lungs, function severely impaired. Not good. Heartbeat faint. Prepare the emergency facilities!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Did the drugs make it yet?
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Right here, coming now!
attributes.name: Medic Operator A

attributes.content: Lend a hand. I'll run through emergency care.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: Looks like they're really busy. I'll come back tomorrow.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Hphhh—hphhh—
attributes.name: Comatose Patient

attributes.content: Operator Sussurro, patient is having trouble with voluntary breathing. We have to remove their respirator and intubate.
attributes.name: Medic Operator A

attributes.content: Anesthetist on standby, please! Emergency intubation! Scalpel!
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: All ready. I'll hold him steady.
attributes.name: Medic Operator B

attributes.content: (Breathing resumes)
attributes.name: Comatose Patient

attributes.content: (Wipes forehead) Good. Let's move him into the theater for the next stage of treatment.
attributes.name: Sussurro

attributes.content: What's so fascinating, Xiaohei?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: That lady... she's amazing.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Agreed. These Medic Operators have always been the pride of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: When they give me missions in future, will I be helping people with the stone disease like they are?
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Stone disease? Do you mean Oripathy? We don't do quite what the medics do—usually, our missions are more aimed at improving conditions for sufferers.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: But in some extreme cases, we need to make a stand in violent conflicts centered around the Infected.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: That sounds like what Master does. He helps out spirits without a home, and hunts down the ones who do bad things.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Spirits...? That's a fine thing, though, wouldn't you say? You'll be doing exactly what your Master does. How do you feel about that?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: ...Really happy, and really proud, that I can do what he did.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: So do you feel a little better now?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Yep!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Then you'd better go get some sleep for real. Go on back.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: I've finished all these books. I wonder if I can find Mountain again, and have him recommend more.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Oh, isn't that him right there? Perfect, I'll go say hi.
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: A little black cat? Miss.Christine? Wait, no, that's not her.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (Who's Christine? Oh, I forgot he's never seen me transform before.)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Meow...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: You have Xiaohei's scent about you. Do you happen to know him?
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: (I'll just let him think so for now...)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Mraaow—
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Hm? Do you want to read this too? Hahah, come on over. Let's read together.
attributes.name: Mountain

attributes.content: Mreww...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (I can't read any of these words...)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (Yawns)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: (So sleepy...)
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: *snore*...
attributes.name: Xiaohei

attributes.content: Climbing on my shoulder just to fall asleep? You're a curious one. Oh, well, I'll be sure to turn the pages quietly.
attributes.name: Mountain
